channel.title: Spiderman 4 on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Spiderman 4 on Game6r

item.title: Spider Hero Street Fight
item.description: Mind-blowing race with the participation of Spider-Man. He cooperates with the police and currently controls the section of the road leading out of the city. You will receive signals about bandits’ cars and you will need to help the hero catch up with them and stop them, pressing them to the side of the road. But offenders are not averse to using this method, so be careful.

item.title: Spider-Man Green Goblin Havoc
item.description: The game Spiderman 4 3d is the new adventures of Spiderman. Terrible mutants are attacking the city. All the inhabitants are in fear and horror, they do not know where to run and where to hide. Only Spider-Man is able to stop the chaos that is happening on the streets. You can help our hero accurately shoot the web at enemies, ruthlessly destroying them at every turn.
